name: GenjiChord
description:
This is a game with music chords.

5 sounds (chords) will be played. Guess which sounds are the same chords. That's all.

 They may all be the same chord, or they may all be different chords. 

If you answered correctly a certain number of times, you will proceed to the next stage.

As you progress through the stages, the types of chords increase and the way they sound becomes more complicated.
